remarks: Two ways to express symmetric difference.  This theorem shows the equivalence of the definition of symmetric difference in [Stoll] p. 13 and the restated definition in Example 4.1 of [Stoll] p. 262.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)  Obsolete as of 30-Apr-2020.  Use ~ dfsymdif3 instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: symdif1OLD $p |- ( ( A \ B ) u. ( B \ A ) ) = ( ( A u. B ) \ ( A i^i B ) ) $.
